extension.name: FPPTA: CPPT Recertification Memberships
extension.description: Provides special handling of a properly configured contribution page, to allow for multiple CPPT re-certifications to be submitted (and paid) at once.
extension.comments: Configuration is at Administer > CiviMember > CPPT Recertification Page. By default, when attempting to change the end date on CPPT membership to the last day of a future year, the end date will be locked to the last day of the current year.
